item.title: Installing Vagrant in non-supported environments
item.description:
Get sources:

$ git clone git@github.com:mitchellh/vagrant.git
$ cd vagrant
$ git checkout tags/v1.6.5

[1]: Without this patch Vagrant will give the following warning: [2]: Without this patch Vagrant will give the following error: [3]: Without this patch Vagrant will give an [error when running in a directory
